channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Reba McEntire finds a new on-screen family in NBC’s ‘Happy’s Place’
item.description: Reba McEntire finds herself behind the bar in her latest return to network TV, making a series that’s a nicely calibrated cocktail of drama and comedy.

item.title: CVS Health CEO Lynch steps down as national chain struggles to right its path
item.description: CVS Health CEO Karen Lynch has stepped down with company shares sinking 19% this year and the health care giant struggling on several fronts.

item.title: US to probe Tesla’s ‘Full Self-Driving’ system after pedestrian killed in low visibility conditions
item.description: The U.S. government’s road safety agency is investigating Tesla’s “Full Self-Driving” system after getting reports of crashes in low-visibility conditions, including one that killed a pedestrian.
